head.s: Asiana Airlines fined US$500K for not helping families after crash

caption.s: Smoke billows from the wreckage after the crash last year .

text.p:
South Korea
-based
Asiana Airlines
was fined
US$
500,000 on Tuesday by the
United States Department of Transportation
for failing to provide support for victims ' families after
Asiana Airlines Flight 214
crashed at San Francisco airport in July 2013 .
Foreign airlines are to abide by a federal law called the " family assistance plan " .
The law states an airline must promptly assist and provide a toll-free number for calls from the passengers ' families .
It took the airline five days to contact the 291 families of the passengers aboard .

p.s:
Of 307 on board , three
Chinese
teens died and over 200 people were injured .
The jet hit a seawall on approach , tearing the rear of the plane off , and throwing three flight attendants onto the runway .

head.s: US prepares to withdrawal troops from Afghanistan

p.s:
United States President
Barack Obama
has ordered
the Pentagon
to make plans to pull all the nation 's troops from
Afghanistan
by the end of 2014 .

The Obama administration notified Afghan president
Hamid Karzai
that it would prefer to keep a residual military presence in Afghanistan for training and counterterrorism missions , but Karzai is refusing to sign the agreement for some US forces to remain .

Once
NATO
ends hostilities in November , a contingency plan for a full departure will begin .
US-Afghan relations have worsened over the past few months .
Obama told Karzai the US will move forward with additional contingency planning if the bilateral agreement to maintain a US presence is not signed .

caption.s: Drummer Lee Rigby , from an official portrait .

p.s:
After
an attack
in the
London
streets last year on British soldier Lee Rigby , two men were sentenced on Wednesday .

The leader of the attack , Michael Adebolajo , was sentenced to
life behind bars
.
Michael Adebowale was given a life sentence , but with the possibility of parole after serving a minimum of 45 years .

In court , the two
Islamic
converts indicated the killing was for
Allah
.
Bystanders watched Adebolajo and Adebowale hit Rigby with a car then butcher him with a meat cleaver and knives .
The attack was recorded on closed-circuit TV and by bystanders .
Both men were convicted of murder in December 2013 .
